type.name: gemini_market_btcusd
type.label: Gemini Market Data (BTC/USD)
type.description: Publically accessible BTC/USD market data such as the order book, last trade price, spread, etc.

type.name: gemini_market_btceth
type.label: Gemini Market Data (BTC/ETH)
type.description: Publically accessible BTC/ETH market data such as the order book, last trade price, spread, etc.

type.name: gemini_market_ethusd
type.label: Gemini Market Data (ETH/USD)
type.description: Publically accessible ETH/USD market data such as the order book, last trade price, spread, etc.

type.name: gemini_order_btcusd
type.label: Gemini Order Data (BTC/USD)
type.description: Private order BTC/USD data such on the public books such as open buys and sells.

type.name: gemini_order_btceth
type.label: Gemini Order Data (BTC/ETH)
type.description: Private order BTC/ETH data such on the public books such as open buys and sells.

type.name: gemini_order_ethusd
type.label: Gemini Order Data (ETH/USD)
type.description: Private order ETH/USD data such on the public books such as open buys and sells.
